meanings.definition: The lifestyle, attitudes, and behavior of yuppies.
meanings.sent1: Yuppydom can be seen in their love for designer brands and fancy restaurants.
meanings.sent2: In the world of yuppydom, success is often measured by material possessions.
meanings.sent3: The yuppydom at the office holiday party was evident as everyone discussed their latest luxury purchases.
meanings.sent4: Her apartment was a shrine to yuppydom, filled with expensive art and sleek furniture.
meanings.sent5: The allure of yuppydom drew him in with promises of status and sophistication.

meanings.definition: The collective characteristics or qualities associated with yuppies.
meanings.sent1: The yuppydom of the group was evident in their shared love for upscale brunch spots.
meanings.sent2: She embodied the essence of yuppydom with her high-paying job and trendy wardrobe.
meanings.sent3: The yuppydom of the neighborhood was undeniable, with its organic markets and luxury car dealerships.
meanings.sent4: His speech was filled with the jargon of yuppydom, discussing stock options and investment portfolios.
meanings.sent5: The yuppydom of the city elite was on full display at the exclusive gala event.
